author: Special Correspondent
text: The All India Forward Bloc (Dinakaran) has condoled the death of veteran Left leader Ashok Ghosh in Kolkata. In a statement issued here on Friday, general secretary of the AIFB faction S. Dinakaran said that in the death of Ashok Ghosh the country had lost an outstanding freedom fighter, who was closely associated with Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose and leaders like Jothi Basu and Indrajit Gupta.
title: Death condoled
